001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import static java.lang.ModuleLayer.defineModulesWithOneLoader;
004import static java.lang.module.Configuration.resolveAndBind;
005
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.DirectoriesToolProvider;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ExecuteProcessToolProvider;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.GrabToolProvider;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ToolFinderSupport;
010import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
011import java.nio.file.Path;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Optional;
014import java.util.ServiceLoader;
015import java.util.Set;
016import java.util.spi.ToolProvider;
017
018/** A finder of tool providers. */
019@FunctionalInterface
020public interface ToolFinder {
021
022  List<ToolProvider> findAll();
023
024  default Optional<ToolProvider> find(String name) {
025    return findAll().stream().filter(provider -> provider.name().equals(name)).findFirst();
026  }
027
028  static ToolFinder of(ToolProvider... providers) {
029    return new ToolFinderSupport.ToolProviderToolFinder(List.of(providers));
030  }
031
032  static ToolFinder of(ModuleFinder finder, boolean assertions, String... roots) {
033    var parentClassLoader = ClassLoader.getPlatformClassLoader();
034    var parentModuleLayer = ModuleLayer.boot();
035    var parents = List.of(parentModuleLayer.configuration());
036    var configuration = resolveAndBind(ModuleFinder.of(), parents, finder, Set.of(roots));
037    var layers = List.of(parentModuleLayer);
038    var controller = defineModulesWithOneLoader(configuration, layers, parentClassLoader);
039    var layer = controller.layer();
040    if (assertions) for (var root : roots) layer.findLoader(root).setDefaultAssertionStatus(true);
041    return ToolFinder.of(layer);
042  }
043
044  static ToolFinder of(ModuleLayer layer) {
045    var loader = ServiceLoader.load(layer, ToolProvider.class);
046    return new ToolFinderSupport.ModuleLayerToolFinder(layer, loader);
047  }
048
049  static ToolFinder of(ClassLoader loader) {
050    return ToolFinder.of(ServiceLoader.load(ToolProvider.class, loader));
051  }
052
053  static ToolFinder of(ServiceLoader<ToolProvider> loader) {
054    return new ToolFinderSupport.ServiceLoaderToolFinder(loader);
055  }
056
057  static ToolFinder ofPrograms(Path directory, Path java, String argsfile) {
058    return new ToolFinderSupport.ProgramsToolFinder(directory, java, argsfile);
059  }
060
061  static ToolFinder ofLayers(Path directory) {
062    return new ToolFinderSupport.LayersToolFinder(directory);
063  }
064
065  static ToolFinder ofBach() {
066    return ToolFinder.of(
067        new DirectoriesToolProvider(), new ExecuteProcessToolProvider(), new GrabToolProvider());
068  }
069
070  static ToolFinder ofSystem() {
071    return ToolFinder.of(ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader());
072  }
073
074  static ToolFinder compose(ToolFinder... finders) {
075    return new ToolFinderSupport.CompositeToolFinder(List.of(finders));
076  }
077}
